title: A Race against people: the story of Hong Kong's re-housing programme
creator_credit: Hong Kong Film Unit and British Information Services
brief_description: The story of Hong Kong’s Re-housing Program. The re-settlement of new migrants and other Chinese members of the community in to high-rise housing provided by the authorities at public expense. Commentary by Eamonn Andrews.
